name: generic-app
description: A comprehensive full-stack application template with Tauri integration

tasks.dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--import=data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; register("node:assert", import.meta.url);' deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:vite dev
tasks.build: NODE_OPTIONS='--import=data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; register("node:assert", import.meta.url);' deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:vite build
tasks.preview: NODE_OPTIONS='--import=data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; register("node:assert", import.meta.url);' deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:vite preview
tasks.check: deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:svelte-kit sync && deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
tasks.check:watch: deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:svelte-kit sync && deno run --allow-all --node-modules-dir npm:svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch
